dct_title_s: Geological map of the United States and the British provinces of North America
dct_description_sm: Mounted on muslin.; Also issued with text of 92 pages under title: A geological map of the United States and the British provinces of North America with explanatory text, geological sections and plates of the fossils which characterize the formations.
